scripts.bundle:android: mkdir -p android/app/build/intermediates/sourcemaps/react/release && react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/ --sourcemap-output android/app/build/intermediates/sourcemaps/react/release/index.android.bundle.packager.map
scripts.bundle:ios: mkdir -p ios/main/assets && react-native bundle --platform ios --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output ios/main.jsbundle --assets-dest ios/main/assets/ --sourcemap-output ios/main.jsbundle.map
scripts.release:a: cd android && ./gradlew clean && cd .. && npm run bundle:android && npm run sentry:android && cd android && ./gradlew bundleRelease
scripts.release:i: npm run bundle:ios && npm run sentry:ios
scripts.sentry:android: npx -y dotenv -e .env -- sh -c 'sentry-cli sourcemaps inject --org "$SENTRY_ORG" --project "$SENTRY_PROJECT" --release "$npm_package_version" ./android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle ./android/app/build/intermediates/sourcemaps/react/release/index.android.bundle.packager.map && sentry-cli sourcemaps upload --org "$SENTRY_ORG" --project "$SENTRY_PROJECT" --release "$npm_package_version" --strip-prefix "$(pwd)" --rewrite ./android/app/build/intermediates/sourcemaps/react/release/index.android.bundle.packager.map'
scripts.sentry:ios: npx -y dotenv -e .env -- sh -c 'sentry-cli sourcemaps inject --org "$SENTRY_ORG" --project "$SENTRY_PROJECT" --release "$npm_package_version" ./ios/main.jsbundle ./ios/main.jsbundle.map && sentry-cli sourcemaps upload --org "$SENTRY_ORG" --project "$SENTRY_PROJECT" --release "$npm_package_version" --strip-prefix "$(pwd)" --rewrite ./ios/main.jsbundle.map'
scripts.sentry:upload: npm run sentry:android && npm run sentry:ios
